tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I visited doctor for my second pregnancy. The care of the doctor was excellent. 

During my delivery it was late night full of raining. Doctor visited the hospital for delivery, the delivery of mine was unforgettable and the Dr.Shwetha saved me and my kid... Thanks for her responsibility and caring.

I recommend Dr.Shwetha for all of my friends and family.

All the staff, room service of motherhood was also good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are not that satisfied with the doctor.  They charge 400Rs for the appointment and she do not even give 5 mins of there time for the patient. She does not clearly explains the precautions to be taken during early days of pregnancy. She will be always in hurry for next patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very nice doctor to have a treatment in Rammurthinagar. Have been to other hospitals like Koshys and Asha not satisfied at all with them. Swetha madam explains very politely and give suggestions for all your problems in nice way. I can rate 5/5 for this hospital and doctor.
She is really sweet doctor, I felt Very comfortable with her,hospital also clean, great staff also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She will be in hurry, want to see as many patients as quickly as possible. Simply scared us on the scan report and advised is to do a scan again ***** *** *** ********. Had a bad experience and sleep less nights

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am having pcos .I went madam for pregnancy within 3 months I got pregnancy..in my I had bleeding madam care for me lot she respond phn call at any time in my emergency..tq I am blessed with baby girl ..nice doctor no doubt u can visit
